name: ASCPEM-PRF-7 - Large Data Resource ColumnSet with Index Element of Excessive Size
description:
Objective
Detection of occurrences of this pattern helps decrease software resource waste by preventing the existence of overly large indices on very large data tables.

Consequence
Software featuring known under-efficient SQL Query and Data Access constructs requires excessive computational resources

qualityRules.name: Quality Rules in numeric ID order

qualityTemplates.name: Quality Templates in numeric ID order
